thread.title: Jurgen Klopp wants to write his name into Liverpool history… and if they lose against Chelsea he will with four home defeats on bounce for first time since 1923
thread.title_full: Jurgen Klopp wants to write his name into Liverpool history… and if they lose against Chelsea he will with four home defeats on bounce for first time since 1923

author: whaughton
title: Jurgen Klopp wants to write his name into Liverpool history… and if they lose against Chelsea he will with four home defeats on bounce for first time since 1923
text:
EFL History maker Jurgen Klopp wants to write his name into Liverpool history… and if they lose against Chelsea he will with four home defeats on bounce for first time since 1923 
Pressure mounting on Jurgen Klopp who is on the verge of making some unwanted history if Liverpool lose at home to Chelsea on Tuesday night Comment
